description.english: Complete Black Death Cemetery
description.schinese: 通关黑死墓园
description.token: Complete Black Death Cemetery

description.english: Have 1 level 10 skill at level 10
description.schinese: 结算时拥有1个10级技能
description.token: Have 1 level 10 skill at level 10

description.english: Unlock all enhancements of 1 skill at the end of the level
description.schinese: 结算时解锁1个技能的全部强化
description.token: Unlock all enhancements of 1 skill at the end of the level

description.english: At least one skill has three auxiliary skills inserted at the end of the level
description.schinese: 结算时至少有1个技能插满三个辅助技能
description.token: At least one skill has three auxiliary skills inserted at the end of the level

description.english: All equipment worn has reached legendary quality
description.schinese: 所有部位装备品质都达到传奇品质
description.token: All equipment worn has reached legendary quality

description.english: Clear the Black Death Cemetery and reach character level 50
description.schinese: 通关黑死墓园且等级达到50级
description.token: Clear the Black Death Cemetery and reach character level 50

description.english: Any one of Strength/Agility/Intelligence exceeds 200
description.schinese: 力量/敏捷/智力中的任意一个属性超过200
description.token: Any one of Strength/Agility/Intelligence exceeds 200

description.english: Critical hit rate reaches 100%
description.schinese: 暴击率达到100%
description.token: Critical hit rate reaches 100%

description.english: At least one resistance reaches 75%
description.schinese: 至少一条抗性达到75%
description.token: At least one resistance reaches 75%

description.english: Unlock any 4 professions
description.schinese: 解锁所有职业
description.token: Unlock any 4 professions

description.english: Kill the BOSS [Skeleton General] in the Black Death Cemetery with burning damage
description.schinese: 用灼烧伤害击杀黑死墓园中的BOSS[骷髅将领]
description.token: Kill the BOSS [Skeleton General] in the Black Death Cemetery with burning damage

description.english: Kill the [Skeleton Shield Soldiers] in the Black Death Cemetery with Chaos Damage, and the number of kills in this round exceeds 100
description.schinese: 用混沌伤害击杀黑死墓园中的[骷髅盾兵] ，且本局击杀数量超过100
description.token: Kill the [Skeleton Shield Soldiers] in the Black Death Cemetery with Chaos Damage, and the number of kills in this round exceeds 100

description.english: Kill the BOSS [Stitched Corpse] in the Black Death Cemetery with bleeding damage, and the bleeding skill causes the highest damage when completing the level
description.schinese: 用流血伤害击杀黑死墓园中的BOSS[缝合巨尸] ，且通关时流血技能造成最高伤害
description.token: Kill the BOSS [Stitched Corpse] in the Black Death Cemetery with bleeding damage, and the bleeding skill causes the highest damage when completing the level

description.english: More than 30 summons or totems exist at the same time
description.schinese: 同时存在超过30个召唤物或图腾
description.token: More than 30 summons or totems exist at the same time

description.english: Cleared the level even after the character's health reached 1
description.schinese: 有惊无险
description.token: Cleared the level even after the character's health reached 1

description.english: Use [Barbarian] to cause a cumulative damage of 100 million points
description.schinese: 使用[野蛮人]累积造成一亿点伤害
description.token: Use [Barbarian] to cause a cumulative damage of 100 million points

description.english: Use [Witch] to cause a cumulative damage of 100 million points
description.schinese: 使用[女巫]累积造成一亿点伤害
description.token: Use [Witch] to cause a cumulative damage of 100 million points

description.english: Use [Paladin] to cause a cumulative damage of 100 million points
description.schinese: 使用[圣骑士]累积造成一亿点伤害
description.token: Use [Paladin] to cause a cumulative damage of 100 million points

description.english: Use [Necromancer] to cause a cumulative damage of 100 million points
description.schinese: 使用[死灵法师]累积造成一亿点伤害
description.token: Use [Necromancer] to cause a cumulative damage of 100 million points

description.english: Use [Ranger] to cause a cumulative damage of 100 million points
description.schinese: 使用[游侠]累积造成一亿点伤害
description.token: Use [Ranger] to cause a cumulative damage of 100 million points

description.english: Use [Assassin] to cause a cumulative damage of 100 million points
description.schinese: 使用[刺客]累积造成一亿点伤害
description.token: Use [Assassin] to cause a cumulative damage of 100 million points

description.english: Use [Death Knight] to cause a cumulative damage of 100 million
description.schinese: 使用[死亡骑士]累积造成一亿点伤害
description.token: Use [Death Knight] to cause a cumulative damage of 100 million

description.english: Use [Shaman] to cause a cumulative damage of 100 million
description.schinese: 使用[萨满]累积造成一亿点伤害
description.token: Use [Shaman] to cause a cumulative damage of 100 million

description.english: The character causes a cumulative 100 million points of physical damage
description.schinese: 角色累积造成一亿点物理伤害
description.token: The character causes a cumulative 100 million points of physical damage

description.english: The character causes a cumulative elemental damage of 100 million points
description.schinese: 角色累积造成一亿点元素伤害
description.token: The character causes a cumulative elemental damage of 100 million points

description.english: The character causes a cumulative 100 million points of fire damage
description.schinese: 角色累积造成一亿点火焰伤害
description.token: The character causes a cumulative 100 million points of fire damage

description.english: The character causes a cumulative 100 million points of cold damage
description.schinese: 角色累积造成一亿点冰寒伤害
description.token: The character causes a cumulative 100 million points of cold damage

description.english: The character causes a cumulative 100 million points of lightning damage
description.schinese: 角色累积造成一亿点闪电伤害
description.token: The character causes a cumulative 100 million points of lightning damage

description.english: The character causes a cumulative 100 million points of abnormal damage (bleeding/poisoning/burning)
description.schinese: 角色累积造成一亿点异常伤害(流血/中毒/灼烧)
description.token: The character causes a cumulative 100 million points of abnormal damage (bleeding/poisoning/burning)

description.english: The character has cumulatively inflicted negative effects 50,000 times
description.schinese: 角色累积施加五万次负面效果
description.token: The character has cumulatively inflicted negative effects 50,000 times

description.english: Have 3 level 10 skills at the end of the level
description.schinese: 关卡结算时拥有3个10级技能
description.token: Have 3 level 10 skills at the end of the level

description.english: Kill the boss [Skeleton King] in the Black Death Cemetery and clear the level while only increasing your luck
description.schinese: 升级只增加幸运的情况下击杀黑死墓园中的BOSS[骷髅王]且通关
description.token: Kill the boss [Skeleton King] in the Black Death Cemetery and clear the level while only increasing your luck

description.english: Complete the level without using the torch
description.schinese: 在没有使用火炬的情况下通关
description.token: Complete the level without using the torch

description.english: Complete any map without taking any damage
description.schinese: 不受任何伤害通关任意地图
description.token: Complete any map without taking any damage

description.english: Complete Black Death Cemetery without using the delete, re-follow, lock, etc. functions
description.schinese: 不使用删除、重随、锁定等功能通关黑死墓园
description.token: Complete Black Death Cemetery without using the delete, re-follow, lock, etc. functions

description.english: Kill the Hellfire Lord boss in the Black Death Cemetery without wearing any epic quality equipment
description.schinese: 不穿戴任何史诗以上品质的装备击杀黑死墓园中的BOSS[地狱炎魔王]
description.token: Kill the Hellfire Lord boss in the Black Death Cemetery without wearing any epic quality equipment

description.english: Level is less than 75 when clearing Black Death Cemetery
description.schinese: 通过黑死墓园时等级小于75级
description.token: Level is less than 75 when clearing Black Death Cemetery

description.english: Kill the boss [Stitched Corpse] in the Black Death Cemetery when all health recovery related attributes are 0
description.schinese: 回血相关属性都是0的情况下击杀黑死墓园中的BOSS[缝合巨尸]
description.token: Kill the boss [Stitched Corpse] in the Black Death Cemetery when all health recovery related attributes are 0

description.english: Collect the complete "BOSS Biographies"
description.schinese: 收集完整的《BOSS列传》
description.token: Collect the complete "BOSS Biographies"

description.english: Collect the complete "Gods and Faiths"
description.schinese: 收集完整的《神祇与信仰》
description.token: Collect the complete "Gods and Faiths"

description.english: Collect the complete "Prophecies and Curses"
description.schinese: 收集完整的《预言和诅咒》
description.token: Collect the complete "Prophecies and Curses"

description.english: Collect all types of fire
description.schinese: 集齐所有类型的火种
description.token: Collect all types of fire

description.english: Collect the complete "Geographical Miscellany"
description.schinese: 收集完整的《地理杂录》
description.token: Collect the complete "Geographical Miscellany"

description.english: Activate 5 or more runes at the same time and clear any level
description.schinese: 同时激活5个或更多符文并通关任意关卡
description.token: Activate 5 or more runes at the same time and clear any level

description.english: Complete any level with all difficulty runes activated
description.schinese: 在激活所有难度符文的情况下通关任意关卡
description.token: Complete any level with all difficulty runes activated

description.english: Survive at 0 Sanity (SAN) for more than one minute
description.schinese: 在理智值（SAN）为0的状态下存活超过1分钟
description.token: Survive at 0 Sanity (SAN) for more than one minute

description.english: Entered all game scenes
description.schinese: 进入过游戏所有的场景
description.token: Entered all game scenes

description.english: Open the hidden wall to enter the prison area
description.schinese: 打开隐藏的墙壁进入监牢区域
description.token: Open the hidden wall to enter the prison area

description.english: Collect the complete "Royal Chronicles of Dunhlo"
description.schinese: 收集完整的《敦赫洛皇家编年史》
description.token: Collect the complete "Royal Chronicles of Dunhlo"

description.english: Corrupt 50 pieces of equipment cumulatively
description.schinese: 累计腐化50件装备
description.token: Corrupt 50 pieces of equipment cumulatively

description.english: Die within 10 seconds of starting the game
description.schinese: 在游戏开始后的10秒内死亡
description.token: Die within 10 seconds of starting the game

description.english: Get legendary equipment from ordinary treasure chests/high-level treasure chests
description.schinese: 开启宝箱开出传奇装备
description.token: Get legendary equipment from ordinary treasure chests/high-level treasure chests

description.english: Open 100 treasure chests cumulatively
description.schinese: 累计开启100个宝箱
description.token: Open 100 treasure chests cumulatively

displayName.english: Rich enough to rival a country
displayName.token: Rich enough to rival a country

description.english: Obtain a total of 1,000,000 gold coins
description.schinese: 累计获得1,000,000金币
description.token: Obtain a total of 1,000,000 gold coins

description.english: Spend a total of 500,000 gold coins gambling at merchants
description.schinese: 在商人处赌博累计花费500,000金币
description.token: Spend a total of 500,000 gold coins gambling at merchants

description.english: Killed all elite monsters and bosses in the game
description.schinese: 击杀过游戏中所有精英怪物和BOSS
description.token: Killed all elite monsters and bosses in the game

description.english: Unlock all achievements except this one
description.schinese: 解锁除此以外的所有成就
description.token: Unlock all achievements except this one

description.schinese: 通关黑死墓园的硬核模式
description.token: Hardcore mode of completing the Black Death Cemetery

description.schinese: 通关雷鸣沼泽的硬核模式
description.token: Complete the hardcore mode of Thunder Swamp.

description.english: Hardcore mode to clear the Corrupted Wasteland
description.schinese: 通关腐蚀荒原的硬核模式
description.token: Hardcore mode to clear the Corrupted Wasteland

description.english: Hardcore mode for clearing the Frozen Ruins
description.schinese: 通关冰封遗迹的硬核模式
description.token: Hardcore mode for clearing the Frozen Ruins

description.english: Hardcore mode for clearing the Infernal Abyss
description.schinese: 通关炎狱深渊的硬核模式
description.token: Hardcore mode for clearing the Infernal Abyss

description.schinese: 通关黑死墓园在10难度的硬核模式
description.token: Complete the Black Death Necropolis on Hardcore Mode, Difficulty 10.

description.schinese: 通关雷鸣沼泽在10难度的硬核模式
description.token: Clear Thunder Swamp on Hardcore Mode at Difficulty 10.

description.schinese: 通关腐蚀荒原在10难度的硬核模式
description.token: Complete the Corrupted Wasteland on Hardcore Mode at Difficulty 10.

description.schinese: 通关冰封遗迹在10难度的硬核模式
description.token: Clear the Frozen Ruins on Hardcore Mode at Difficulty 10.

description.english: Clear the Infernal Abyss on Hardcore Mode at Difficulty 10.
description.schinese: 通关炎狱深渊在10难度的硬核模式
description.token: Clear the Infernal Abyss on Hardcore Mode at Difficulty 10.

description.english: Complete the Black Death Necropolis on Hardcore Mode at Difficulty 20.
description.schinese: 通关黑死墓园在20难度的硬核模式
description.token: Complete the Black Death Necropolis on Hardcore Mode at Difficulty 20.

displayName.english: The Heir of the Thunder King
displayName.token: The Heir of the Thunder King

description.english: Clear Thunder Swamp on Hardcore Mode at Difficulty 20
description.schinese: 通关雷鸣沼泽在20难度的硬核模式
description.token: Clear Thunder Swamp on Hardcore Mode at Difficulty 20

description.english: Complete the Corrupted Wasteland on Hardcore Mode at Difficulty 20.
description.schinese: 通关腐蚀荒原在20难度的硬核模式
description.token: Complete the Corrupted Wasteland on Hardcore Mode at Difficulty 20.

description.schinese: 通关冰封遗迹在20难度的硬核模式
description.token: Clear the Frozen Ruins on Hardcore Mode at Difficulty 20.

description.schinese: 通关炎狱深渊在20难度的硬核模式
description.token: Clear the Infernal Abyss on Hardcore Mode at Difficulty 20

description.english: Reach 1 rounds in the endless mode of any level.
description.schinese: 在任意一关卡的无尽模式中达到1轮
description.token: Reach 5 rounds in the endless mode of any level.

description.english: Reach 2 rounds in the endless mode of any level.
description.schinese: 在任意一关卡的无尽模式中达到2轮
description.token: Reach 10 rounds in the endless mode of any level.

description.english: Complete 1 rounds in Endless Mode on any level at difficulty 10.
description.schinese: 在任意一关卡10难度下的无尽模式中达到1轮
description.token: Complete 5 rounds in Endless Mode on any level at difficulty 10.

description.english: Complete 2 rounds in Endless Mode on any level at difficulty 10.
description.schinese: 在任意一关卡10难度下的无尽模式中达到2轮
description.token: Reach 10 rounds in Endless Mode on any level at difficulty 10.

description.english: Reach 1 rounds in Endless Mode on any level at difficulty 20.
description.schinese: 在任意一关卡20难度下的无尽模式中达到1轮
description.token: Complete 5 rounds in Endless Mode on any level at difficulty 20.

description.english: Reach 2 rounds in Endless Mode on any level at difficulty 20.
description.schinese: 在任意一关卡20难度下的无尽模式中达到2轮
description.token: Reach 10 rounds in Endless Mode on any level at difficulty 20.

description.english: Draw a prize at the Christmas tree.
description.schinese: 在圣诞树处抽一次奖
description.token: Draw a prize at the Christmas tree.

description.english: 1000 draws at the Christmas tree
description.schinese: 在圣诞树处累计抽奖100次
description.token: 1000 draws at the Christmas tree

description.english: Disassemble any piece of equipment
description.schinese: 分解任意一件装备
description.token: Disassemble any piece of equipment

description.english: Forge any piece of equipment to level 10.
description.schinese: 将任意一件装备锻造到10级
description.token: Forge any piece of equipment to level 10.

description.english: Reset any piece of equipment
description.schinese: 重置任意一件装备
description.token: Reset any piece of equipment

description.english: A total of 1,000 pieces of equipment have been dismantled.
description.schinese: 累计分解1000件装备
description.token: A total of 1,000 pieces of equipment have been dismantled.

description.english: All equipment pieces worn are forged to level 10.
description.schinese: 穿戴的所有部位的装备锻造等级都达到10级
description.token: All equipment pieces worn are forged to level 10.

description.english: Forging a piece of equipment to level 10, with all 10 upgrades focusing on the same affix.
description.schinese: 将一件装备锻造到10级，且10次提升的都是同一词缀
description.token: Forging a piece of equipment to level 10, with all 10 upgrades focusing on the same affix.

description.english: Unlock any pet
description.schinese: 解锁任意一只宠物
description.token: Unlock any pet

description.english: Use the pet function to pick up any item.
description.schinese: 使用宠物功能拾取任意一件物品
description.token: Use the pet function to pick up any item.

description.english: Disassemble any piece of equipment using the pet function.
description.schinese: 使用宠物功能分解任意一件装备
description.token: Disassemble any piece of equipment using the pet function.
